paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant brca2Q658X, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: predisposed to testicular neoplasias and infertility

individual_records.phenotype_details: developed as infertile males with meiotic arrest in spermatocytes
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Homozygous brca2Q658X zebrafish develop as infertile males with meiotic arrest in spermatocytes.
Adult brca2Q658X homozygous zebrafish are predisposed to testicular neoplasias.
Homozygous brca2Q658X homozygotes fail to develop ovaries during sexual differentiation.
Homozygous brca2Q658X homozygotes fail to develop ovaries during sexual differentiation.

functional_data.summary: The brca2Q658X mutation affects ovarian development and predisposes to tumorigenesis.

variants.segregation_data: The brca2Q658X mutation segregates with infertility and tumorigenesis in zebrafish.
variants.additional_notes: The study utilized a zebrafish model to investigate the effects of the brca2Q658X mutation.
key_quotes: Homozygous brca2Q658X zebrafish develop as infertile males with meiotic arrest in spermatocytes.
Adult brca2Q658X homozygous zebrafish are predisposed to testicular neoplasias.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was clear and well-defined in the text.
